title: Tomorrow is Forever
description: His eyes were dark with pain and as Elizabeth Herlong looked at the guest her husband had brought to dinner, she felt a tremor of recognition. But how could she have known this bearded stranger, able to walk only with the aid of a cane? Where in her sheltered existence as the wife of a Hollywood producer and the mother three children, could she have met this refugee writer from Germany? And why was she so sure that he, more than anyone else, could understand the uncertainties that racked her soul?
author: Gwen Bristow
